constantValues: Substance may be used to describe a kind of substance, or a specific package/container of the substance: an instance.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: createdBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who created the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the record.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: createdOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.

members.name: importSequenceNumber

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.

members.name: modifiedOn

members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who modified the record.

members.name: instanceExpiry

constantValues: When the substance is no longer valid to use. For some substances, a single arbitrary date is used for expiry.

members.description: When the substance is no longer valid to use. For some substances, a single arbitrary date is used for expiry.

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: substanceInstanceNumber

constantValues: Identifier associated with the package/container (usually a label affixed directly).

members.description: Identifier associated with the package/container (usually a label affixed directly).

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: statusCode

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Substance Instance

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'SubstanceInstance' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

definitions.description: Substance may be used to describe a kind of substance, or a specific package/container of the substance: an instance.
